item.title: 观看：日本 1 月份核心消费通胀率连续第三个月放缓，但好于预期，维持在央行 2% 的目标水平，使人们继续期待央行将在 4 月份结束负利率。
item.description:
WATCH: Japan's core consumer inflation slowed for a third straight month in January but beat forecasts and held at the central bank's 2% target, keeping alive expectations it will end negative interest rates by April https://t.co/U73xgwuMay pic.twitter.com/QfRNzlqe22

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚政府于 2023 年 3 月通过立法，强制要求员工人数超过 100 人的企业公布男女员工的薪酬，此后，澳大利亚政府首次公布了这些企业的性别薪酬差距数据。更多信息
item.description:
The Australian government released for the first time data on gender pay gaps at firms with more than 100 employees, following legislation passed in March 2023 that forced them to reveal the pay of male and female employees. More here https://t.co/V0uXUC1Cp0 pic.twitter.com/dvdUIPHHnT

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 在日内瓦车展上，雷诺发布了新款电动车 R5，该车将成为最经济实惠的电动车之一，帮助这家法国公司与大量涌入并抢占市场份额的中国低价电动车竞争。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
At the Geneva Motor Show, Renault unveils its new electric R5 that is meant to be among the most affordable electric vehicles and help the French firm compete with an influx of low-priced Chinese EVs that have been grabbing market share. More here: https://t.co/s42j1Wwe2d pic.twitter.com/D47fB1x8a7

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 印度西部马哈拉施特拉邦的一位高级官员表示，该邦将检查全球快餐品牌的分店，以检查它们是否在错误宣传含有真正奶酪的产品中使用奶酪替代品，从而扩大对麦当劳的打击之外的审查范围。
item.description:
India's western state of Maharashtra will inspect outlets of global fast-food brands to check if they use cheese alternatives in products wrongly promoted as containing real cheese, widening scrutiny beyond a crackdown on McDonald's, a top official said https://t.co/XerqSUSHJr

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 官方数据显示，澳大利亚私营企业男性员工的收入比女性同事高出约 22%，政府首次公布了员工人数超过 100 人的企业的性别薪酬差距。更多信息
item.description:
Male employees in Australian private firms earn around 22% more than their women colleagues, official data showed, as the government released for the first time gender pay gaps at companies with more than 100 employees. More here https://t.co/V0uXUC1Cp0 pic.twitter.com/FoMtZGjZtG

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 英国资产管理公司良好行为准则》的编制者表示，该准则将进行全面审查，以促进经济增长和提高国际竞争力，此举可能会提高高层管理人员的薪酬。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Britain's code of good practice for asset managers will undergo a root-and-branch review to aid economic growth and international competitiveness, its compiler said, in a move that could see pay of top executives bumped up. More here: https://t.co/n92d7IDdi1

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：在太空探索公司宣布其奥德修斯号月球着陆器倾覆后，直觉机器公司的股价大幅下跌了 30% 以上。
item.description:
WATCH: Intuitive Machines witnessed a sharp fall of over 30% in its shares following the announcement by the space exploration company that its Odysseus moon lander had tipped over https://t.co/QjtA7iXwC7 pic.twitter.com/bWogzzwc9G

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：美国联邦贸易委员会和八个州表示，他们将提起诉讼，阻止连锁超市克罗格（Kroger）斥资 246 亿美元收购规模较小的竞争对手阿尔伯森（Albertsons）的交易，称这将提高数百万美国人的食品杂货价格。
item.description:
WATCH: The US Federal Trade Commission and eight states said they are suing to block supermarket chain Kroger's $24.6 billion deal to buy smaller rival Albertsons, saying it would boost grocery prices for millions of Americans https://t.co/53b3jMvqtB pic.twitter.com/ZdoNzBgFN4

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：美股小幅收跌，焦点转向即将公布的经济数据，包括美联储首选的通胀指标--1月份个人消费支出物价指数
item.description:
WATCH: US stocks ended with modest losses as the focus shifted to upcoming economic data including January's personal consumption expenditures price index, the Federal Reserve's preferred inflation gauge https://t.co/ZPpu6lDZRf pic.twitter.com/RkssNj9njA

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024
